### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference

* **Title**: SCADA Software and Hardware Installation
* **Reference Number**: WS4420295552-Doc4422475987
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4420295552
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-21T14:00:00 (EST)

#### Details

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and installation of an upgraded SCADA software package and computer equipment to be used to monitor the water and sewer infrastructure throughout Waterton Park, Alberta.

**End User**: Parks Canada Agency (PCA)

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Regions of Delivery**: Alberta

**Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (Ministry)

**Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open bidding

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18693503?extsite=MTg2OTM1MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Bid Requirements

Respondents must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by the tender closing date and time. All bids submitted after this time may be considered non-responsive.

**Technical Requirements**:

* Respondents must comply with the requirements specified in the Annex Mandatory Technical Criteria

**Proposal Submissions**:

* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform

### Contract Details

* The proposed contract is from contract award to 2024-03-31
* The end user is the Parks Canada Agency (PCA) for monitoring water and sewer infrastructure in Waterton Park, Alberta

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification, refer to the notice URL or contact Willy Zumbado Diaz, PSPC, at willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  Please note that no postal address is provided by the respondent.
